amendment.description: An amendment numbered 18 printed in the Congressional Record to exclude oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the Southern California planning area.
amendment.purpose: Amendment sought to exclude oil and gas leasing in any tract located in the Southern California planning area.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Levin amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 49).

action.text: House amendment offered/reported by: Amendment (A022) offered by Mr. Levin.
House amendment not agreed to: On agreeing to the Levin amendment (A022) Failed by recorded vote: 213 - 218 (Roll no. 49).
Roll call votes on amendments in House
Amendment failed in Committee of the Whole
